subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Milwaukee fell behind twice in the first four innings but hit three home runs and scored six runs in the fifth to emerge with a victory over St. Louis in Game 1 of the N.L. Championship Series.
snippet: Milwaukee fell behind twice in the first four innings but hit three home runs and scored six runs in the fifth to emerge with a victory over St. Louis in Game 1 of the N.L. Championship Series.
